docket_entries.description: Chapter 11 Voluntary Petition, 20 Largest Creditors, Disclosure of Attorney Compensation, Corporate Vote and Declaration Re: Electronic Filing Filing Fee in the Amount of $ 1039 filed by Scott R. Stevenson on behalf of Link Development, LLC. (Stevenson, Scott) CORRECTIVE ENTRY: Text modified to reflect documents filed. Modified on 2/3/2010 (ll, usbc). (Entered: 01/28/2010)
BNC Certificate of Mailing - Meeting of Creditors. RE: 2 Court's Notice of 341 sent - 11 Corporation Service Date 01/31/2010. (Admin.) (Entered: 02/01/2010)
Order Dated 2/2/10 Reassigning Case. Involvement of Henry J. Boroff Terminated; Judge William C. Hillman added to case. (sas, USBC) (Entered: 02/02/2010)

Order to Update Re: 1 Chapter 11 Voluntary Petition. Matrix Sheet Due 2/8/2010. List of Equity Security Holders, Schedules A-H, Statement of Financial Affairs and Summary of schedules Due: 2/17/2010. Incomplete Filings due by 2/17/2010. (ll, usbc) (Entered: 02/03/2010)
Court Certificate of Mailing Re: 5 Order to Update. (ll, usbc) (Entered: 02/03/2010)
BNC Certificate of Mailing. RE: 4 Order to Reassign or Transfer Case Service Date 02/04/2010. (Admin.) (Entered: 02/05/2010)
Notice of Appearance and Request for Notice by John F. Drew with certificate of service filed by Creditor RFF Family Partnership Limited Partnership (Drew, John) (Entered: 02/05/2010)
BNC Certificate of Mailing - Meeting of Creditors. RE: 7 Court's Notice of 341 sent - 11 Corporation Service Date 02/05/2010. (Admin.) (Entered: 02/06/2010)
Motion filed by Assistant U.S. Trustee John Fitzgerald to Dismiss Case with certificate of service (Hertz, Jennifer) (Entered: 02/08/2010)

Hearing scheduled for 3/3/2010 at 09:30 AM Boston Courtroom 2, 12th Floor, 5 Post Office Square, Boston, MA 02109 RE: 11 Motion to Dismiss Case filed by Assistant U.S. Trustee John Fitzgerald. Objections due by 3/1/2010 by 12:00 noon. (ph, USBC) (Entered: 02/09/2010)

Motion filed by Debtor Link Development, LLC to Extend Time to File Matrix with certificate of service (Stevenson, Scott) CORRECTIVE ENTRY: Text modified to more accurately reflect document filed. Modified on 2/11/2010 (ll, usbc). (Entered: 02/10/2010)
Matrix (Re: 1 Chapter 11 Petition - case upload) filed by Debtor Link Development, LLC (Stevenson, Scott) (Entered: 02/10/2010)
BNC Certificate of Mailing - Hearing. RE: 12 Hearing Scheduled Service Date 02/11/2010. (Admin.) (Entered: 02/12/2010)
Order dated 2/12/2010 Re: 13 Motion filed by Debtor Link Development, LLC to Extend Time to File Matrix. Granted. (ll, usbc) (Entered: 02/12/2010)
BNC Certificate of Mailing - PDF Document. RE: 16 Order on Motion for Leave to File Service Date 02/14/2010. (Admin.) (Entered: 02/15/2010)
